body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Ronald Allen and I work for ABC Auto Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. To assist you better, may I have your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three eight two, nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Sandra. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had a recent experience at your dealership that left me feeling sad.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sandra. Your feedback is valuable to us. Thank you for sharing. Is there anything else you would like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Sandra. Your concerns have been noted, and we will do our best to address them. Have a wonderful day!
